ticket.title: No Content-Length, ETag, or Last-Modified-Date in HEAD request response with send_file
ticket.original-body:
Recently upgraded to Rails 3 and found that there are no longer 'Content-Length', 'Etag', or 'Last-Modified' headers in the response to a HEAD request when using send_file.
According to the HTTP spec, the 'Content-Length' should be there in a HEAD request response.
We've tested this on Apache/Passenger. Rails 3.01.

version.body:
I'm seeing the same, but I also see that 'Content-Length' is forcefully deprecated in send_file_headers!
Rails 2.3-stable however sends it.
I have not checked the HTTP specs but it might be intended, awaiting more confirmations from devs.
As a temporary solution it might not be too hard to publicize send_file_headers! and force a headers.merge!
